title: The Window
overview: The Window is a character-based thriller set in the world of elite professional football. Focusing on an ensemble cast of players, agents, club owners, administrators and journalists, the series explores the cutthroat off-field machinations of the game. The series begins at the end of the English soccer season – with the transfer window opening. Across ten episodes The Window charts one summer in the life of Jordan Burdett, a  17-year-old Wunderkind who is on the wish list of every club in Europe. The tug of war begins…
